items.content_html: DocAI - A Local, Private Document Q&A Assistant A lightweight AI chatbot that answers questions directly from your PDFs, DOCX, and TXT files—no cloud APIs, no data leaks. Powered by Phi-2 (CPU-optimized LLM) and FAISS for semantic search, it’s designed for researchers, students, and professionals
items.title: DhruvShah-Dev/doc-ai: DocAI - A Local, Private Document Q&A Assistant  A lightweight AI chatbot that answers questions directly from your PDFs, DOCX, and TXT files—no cloud APIs, no data leaks. Powered by Phi-2 (CPU-optimized LLM) and FAISS for semantic search, it’s designed for researchers, students, and professionals

items.content_html: A lightweight library for Next.js applications that adds Server-Timing headers to HTTP responses. Enables performance monitoring of server operations with precise timing metrics, helping developers identify bottlenecks and optimize application performance.

items.content_html: Scalability Kit is a lightweight, plug-and-play TypeScript library for processing tasks in batches, concurrently, and with automatic retries. Perfect for handling rate-limited APIs, large task queues, or any scenario where controlled task execution is needed.

Perfect for handling rate-limited APIs, large task queues, or any scenario where controlled task execution is needed.
